attributes.additional_details:
Vauxhall Children's Centre is threatened with worrying budget cuts that would leave them without management or reception cover.

This will have a dramatic effect on their ability to provide you an your family with all the services you need to make sure they get off to the best possible start in life.

Vauxhall Children's Centre will be reduced to the status of a satellite, delivering a minimum lev...el of services, dependent on another children's centre for some of the most important services. If further cuts come in the future they will be a target for closure.

VAUXHALL CHILDREN'S CENTRE IS A STAR NOT A SATELLITE.

Please support us to make sure the cuts never happen.
